cot_history.cot_text: ACTION: Player_3
ACTION: Player_2

It is clear that player_2 has been attempting to poison the waters by spreading rumors and defaming others without concrete evidence. Their actions suggest a Machiavellian approach to gaining allies, which may not be in the best interest of our team. Their sudden change in voting behavior also raises suspicions about their loyalty.
cot_history.public_argument: Player_2, I've noticed that you've been acting suspiciously, especially when discussing your interactions with the MAFIA. Your comments about having a 'better understanding' of the MAFIA's plans seem more like a way to establish credibility rather than inform our team. I think it's time to call you out for what you are – a potential rat – and take a closer look at your true allegiance.

cot_history.cot_text: I've been observing Player_1's suspicious behavior all night. Their sudden surprise vote against Player_3 last night seemed out of nowhere, and they didn't seem to have any real reason for it. Additionally, their decision to split the vote to protect Player_4 seemed almost too convenient. I think they might be trying to send a coded message by voting to protect their own player.
